body_html:
@Taha-Bahadori thanks for the request and the private message you sent.

This is something that we can do, but it's a large undertaking, because the GPU code that we use (MAGMA) doesn't support batched SVD.

Magma has a few routines that are batched, which are listed at http://icl.cs.utk.edu/projectsfiles/magma/doxygen/group__batched.html

Anything outside this scope, it's ~1 month engineering work for us.
Hence, we are not able to raise the priority of this feature at this point.

cc: @SsnL to make sure I didn't mis-speak any details.

body:
@Taha-Bahadori  thanks for the request and the private message you sent.

This is something that we can do, but it's a large undertaking, because the GPU code that we use (MAGMA) doesn't support batched SVD.

Magma has a few routines that are batched, which are listed at http://icl.cs.utk.edu/projectsfiles/magma/doxygen/group__batched.html

Anything outside this scope, it's ~1 month engineering work for us.
Hence, we are not able to raise the priority of this feature at this point.

cc: @SsnL to make sure I didn't mis-speak any details.
